title: 1.3.2工业2（Industrial Craft 2 ）mod的更新条目
author: hendyzone
txt_content:
本帖最后由 hendyzone 于 2012-9-16 20:52 编辑 

 lz还会更新新物品和机器的介绍（如果它把wiki弄出来的话= =）
 v1.106 (IC²)

    Minecraft 1.3.2 compatible
    Added new model to the Personal Safe
    Added energy cost to Quantum Suit Helmet poison removal
    Fixed shift-clicking fuel into generators not
    Fixed Nukes not being ignitable with a flint and steel (rightclick it like TNT)
    Fixed Dynamite-O-Mote not displaying the number of igniting dynamite (still does not work in creative mode)
    Fixed Crazy Ivan achievement recognizing the nuke's placer and not igniter
    Improved Nuke usage logging on servers
    NUCLEAR REACTOR REWORK: New components and slightly changed mechanics. Redstone behavior was inverted, reactors now require redstone to run. Dismount your reactors before updating or face the consequences! Server owners can prevent reactors from running by setting energyGeneratorNuclear to 0 in the config
    HAZMAT SUIT: Absorbs (or with full set fully negates) environmental damage. The full set is made of the Scuba Helmet, Hazmat Chestplate and Leggings and Rubber Boots.
    Added Compressed Air Cells, produced by compressing an Empty Cell and consumed by the Scuba Helmet to refill bubbles
    Added non-functional (will only be in 1.4) Nightvision Goggles
    Fixed NotEnoughItems compatibility
    Fixed Toolbox crash
    Fixed Cropnalyzers not working
    Nukes and reactor explosions are poisonous
    Updated sprites for some items 
v1.106 (IC²) 

 兼容了Minecraft1.3.2；为个人保险箱（Personal Safe）添加了新的模型；头盔使用免疫毒素的效果时会消耗更多的能源；修复了按住shift点击燃料无法添加到发电机的bug；修复了核弹（Nuke）无法直接用打火石点燃的bug（就像点燃TNT那样右击它）（现在拿着打火石对着核弹右键就可以点燃）；修复了引爆器（Dynamite-O-Mote）不会显示点燃炸药（Dynamite）的数目的bug（创造模式下依然不会显示）；修复了成就（Crazy Ivan）会识别放置了却没有点燃的核弹的bug；改进了核弹（Nuke）在服务器上使用时的记录方法；与核能相关的改变：添加了新的零件以及对机器进行了一些细微的改变。对于红石信号的反应被倒置，现在核反应炉需要有红石信号才会工作。在核反应炉停止工作后再拆除它！服主可以通过把配置文件中的 energyGeneratorNuclear设为0来禁止核反应炉的使用；防护套装（HAZMAT SUIT）（这样翻没问题吗= =）：吸收（或者穿着全套可以免除）周围环境造成的伤害。全套由潜水头盔（Scuba Helmet）防护胸甲和护腿（ Hazmat Chestplate and Leggings）以及橡胶鞋（Rubber Boots）；添加了压缩的空气单元（Compressed Air Cells），它通过压缩一个空的单元来得到。可以用来填充潜水头盔来供给消耗；添加了没有功能的夜视镜（Nightvision Goggles）（只会在1.4版本时添加有功能的）；修复了与NEI的兼容；修复了 工具箱（Toolbox）的冲突错误；修复了种子检测器（Cropnalyzers）有时不工作的bug；核弹和核反应炉的爆炸将会有伤害辐射；更新了一些物品的sprite。

还有一些东西的添加更新里没提到0 0不知道为什么
